REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM F A f0461 reute r f BC-SOUTHDOWN-<SDW>-DOWNG 03-06 0074

TEXT.TITLE: SOUTHDOWN <SDW> DOWNGRADED BY S/P
TEXT.BODY: Standard and Poor's said it lowered its rating of Southdown Inc's 50 mln dlrs of sinking fund debentures to BB-plus from BBB and removed the issue from Creditwatch. The downgrading reflects higher debt levels from the debt-financed repurchase of 89 mln dlrs worth of common shares, combined with a bleaker earnings outlook due to weakness in key energy and Southwest cement markets. Reuter
